item.description: Hey! My name is Emily Gong, I’m a rising third year studying Math of Comp and Linguistics at UCLA.

item.title: How to Fetch Data through the Spotify API

item.description: Why building a website with Hugo? In short, it’s a really fast and simple way to have a static website to yourself, through which you can display your recent projects, share your thoughts, and have fun with it. Before we officially start… The tutorial is based on macOS and I’m using GitHub for deployment. ðŸ› Tools you’ll need Terminal A text editor like VSCode GitHub hugo Setting up Open your terminal - easy!

item.title: Exploring K-pop and BTS Song Popularity with Spotify Audio Features & Song Lyrics
Hello World!
item.description: This is my first time building a website and I’m hoping to add more fun stuff to it, like my data science projects, some design projects, and maybe some drawing + photography? We will see ;)
